show.subtitle: Mickey Huff is co-host of the Project Censored Show with former Project Censored director Dr. Peter Phillips. It airs on the progressiveradionetwork.com out of New York City
show.title: Project Censored

title: Project Censored
content:
On the June 28 Project Censored Show on Pacifica Radio Mickey Huff and  Peter Phillips speak to Napoleon Gomez about... <!--more--> his new book Collapse of Dignity: The Story of a Mining Tragedy and the Fight Against Greed and Corruption in Mexico.
the show also carries  a special report from Tara Dorobji who recently spoke with author Mat Johnson about how writers of color are often locked out of the publishing world.
They conclude the show with a conversation with surveillance state expert and philosophy professor Elliot Cohen about the ramifications of NSA leaker Edward Snowen, how the corporate media are missing the story about living in a full blown 1984.
